_header: Mary Mother Queen of heaven / Think on me and hear my steven
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — seventeen couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Marie Modur Qwen of heueneþenk on me and here my
                    steuene…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Marie in to blisse wiþ þe to woneffor Ihesu loue
                    þi deore sone. AMEN.

Lam559.First Lines:
Goddes modir quene of heuenthou thenke on me and her myn
                    steuen…
Lam559.Last Lines:
…And pray for me to thi swete sonthat I may hasteli of
                    synnedelyuerid be fro payneand sauid in heuenAnd also ladi dwell
                    with thein ioye withouten endeAmen for charite
